dyad.stats.period

Period (dyad.stats.period)

This module contains probability distributions for the orbital periods of a population of binary stars. In its documentation the random variable is denoted \(P\) and a realization of that random variable is denoted \(p\).

Probability distributions

trunclognorm

A truncated lognormal random variable

duquennoy1991

The period random variable of Duquennoy and Mayor (1991)

moe2017

The period random variable of Moe and Stefano (2017)

Classes

duquennoy1991_gen([momtype, a, b, xtol, ...])

The period random variable of Duquennoy and Mayor (1991)

moe2017_gen([momtype, a, b, xtol, badvalue, ...])

The period random variable of Moe and Stefano (2017)

trunclognorm_gen([momtype, a, b, xtol, ...])

A truncated lognormal random variable
